title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Instructional Design to Mitigate Gender Gaps in Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational logical understanding and experience in solving simple problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain computational thinking concepts (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction) through unplugged activities with over 80% accuracy
In a blended learning environment, over 70% of learners regardless of gender complete programming simulation tasks
Project outcomes demonstrate a 20%+ increase in female students' self-efficacy survey scores compared to pre-assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
